metadata.title: Elon Musk suggests AI will make work ‘optional’. These experts weigh in | CNN
metadata.description: Will AI make work optional or just unrecognizable? Erik Hirsch and futurist Sinead Bovell break down what’s realistic, what’s hype, and how workers should prepare for a future where efficiency, automation, and market power collide.
metadata.author: TARA COUGHLIN
